column5: Surrounded by the charming shops, local restaurants and historic properties of Chappell Hill is the Cottage Blue On Main.  The newly designed historic property now known as Cottage Blue offers a retreat from the hustle and bustle of city life setting you amidst the happenings on a Main Street in small town Texas.  You are also only 30 minutes from the very popular Round Top area known for it's Antique Fairs and very Texan lifestyle.
column8: Cottage Blue On Main in Historic Chappell Hill
